comments:
When I try to refactor (rename) a package, choosing all of the available options:

Update references
Rename subpackages
Update textual occurrences....
Update fully qualified names....
Filename patterns: *

I receive the following error:

An exception has been caught while processing the refactoring 'Rename Package'.

Reason:
End position lies outside document range

Three exceptions were thrown:

1.
